Alexandria.Signature Theatre (Arlington, Virginia):
Signature Theatre is a Greater Washington D.C. Area regional theater company based in Arlington, Virginia.


== History ==
Founded in 1990, the Signature Theatre is known for its productions of musicals and new plays. Under the leadership of Co-Founder and Artistic Director Eric D. Schaeffer and Managing Director Maggie Boland, the company has staged 38 world premiere productions.
